trans-unit.source: Represents a numeric value between - 10^38 +1 and 10^38 - 1, with fixed precision and scale.
<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal> has different underlying data structures from its corresponding .NET Framework <xref:System.Decimal> data type.
<xref:System.Decimal> has no concept of precision.
It uses 3 bytes to store the actual data, and therefore has a maximum scale of 28.
<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal> has both precision and scale.
It uses 4 unsigned 4-byte integers to store the actual data, and therefore has maximum precision and scale of 38.
The data range is - 10^38 +1 through 10^38 - 1.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied <xref href="System.Decimal"></xref> value.
The <xref href="System.Decimal"></xref> value to be stored as a <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied double parameter.
A double, representing the value for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied integer value.
The supplied integer value which will the used as the value of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied long integer value.
The supplied long integer value which will the used as the value of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied parameters.

The maximum number of digits that can be used to represent the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

The number of decimal places to which the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property will be resolved for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure represents a positive or negative number.
The 128-bit unsigned integer that provides the value of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied parameters.

The maximum number of digits that can be used to represent the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

The number of decimal places to which the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property will be resolved for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure represents a positive or negative number.

An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data2, data3, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures value.

An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data3, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures value.

An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data2, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures value.

An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data2, and data3 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures value.
The Abs method gets the absolute value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> parameter.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property contains the unsigned number representing the absolute value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> parameter.
Calculates the sum of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operators.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Add%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property contains the sum.
The scale of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operand will be adjusted to the number of digits indicated by the digits parameter.
Depending on the value of the fRound parameter, the value will either be rounded to the appropriate number of digits or truncated.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to be adjusted.
The number of digits in the adjusted structure.
If this parameter is `true`, the new Value will be rounded, if `false`, the value will be truncated.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property contains the adjusted number.
Get the binary representation of the value of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure as an array of bytes.
An array of bytes that contains the binary representation of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's value.
Returns the smallest whole number greater than or equal to the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure for which the ceiling value is to be calculated.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> representing the smallest whole number greater than or equal to the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> instance to the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> object and returns an indication of their relative values.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> to be compared.
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
Return value
Condition
Less than zero
This instance is less than the object.
Zero
This instance is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This instance is greater than the object
-or-
The object is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)
Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> instance to the supplied <xref href="System.Object"></xref> and returns an indication of their relative values.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be compared.
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
Return Value
Condition
Less than zero
This instance is less than the object.
Zero
This instance is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This instance is greater than the object
-or-
The object is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)
Adjusts the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operand to the indicated precision and scale.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose value is to be adjusted.
The precision for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
The scale for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose Value has been adjusted to the precision and scale indicated in the parameters.
Gets the binary representation of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure as an array of integers.
An array of integers that contains the binary representation of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
The division operator calculates the results of dividing the first <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operand by the second.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Divide%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property contains the results of the division.

Compares the supplied <xref href="System.Object"></xref> parameter to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be compared.
`true` if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> and the two are equal.
Otherwise, `false`.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operands to determine whether they are equal.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
`true` if the two values are equal.
Otherwise, `false`.
If either instance is null, the value of the `SqlDecimal` will be null.
Rounds a specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> number to the next lower whole number.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure for which the floor value is to be calculated.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure that contains the whole number part of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
A `string` value that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
Performs a logical comparison of two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
Otherwise, <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> parameters to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
Otherwise, <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure is null.
For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).
`true` if this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure is null.
Otherwise, `false`.

Otherwise, `false`.

A constant representing the largest possible value for the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Precision"></xref> property.
The value of this constant is 38.
A constant representing the maximum value for the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Scale"></xref> property.
A constant representing the maximum value of a <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property contains the product of the multiplication.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> parameters to determine whether they are not equal.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> is null, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.

For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).

The unary minus operator negates the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> parameter.

A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose value contains the results of the negation.
Converts the <xref href="System.String"></xref> representation of a number to its <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> equivalent.
The `String` to be parsed.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> equivalent to the value that is contained in the specified <xref href="System.String"></xref>.

A double value that indicates the power to which the number should be raised.

Gets the maximum number of digits used to represent the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property.
The maximum number of digits used to represent the `Value` of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to be rounded.
The number of significant fractional digits (precision) in the return value.

The number of decimal places to which the `Value` property is resolved.

The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose sign is to be evaluated.
A number that indicates the sign of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose Value property contains the results of the subtraction.
Returns the a double equal to the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property of this instance.
The decimal representation of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> is non-zero; `false` if zero; otherwise Null.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure whose `Value` equals the `Value` of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's Value is `true`, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure's `Value` will be 1.
Otherwise, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure's `Value` will be 0.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"></xref> structure with the same value as this instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16"></xref> structure with the same value as this instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32"></xref> structure with the same value as this instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64"></xref> structure with the same value as this instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney"></xref> structure with the same value as this instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle"></xref> structure with the same value as this instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString"></xref> structure whose value is a string representing the value contained in this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.String"></xref>.

A new <xref href="System.String"></xref> object that contains the string representation of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value"></xref> property.
Truncates the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's value to the that you want position.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to be truncated.
The decimal position to which the number will be truncated.
Supply a negative value for the position parameter in order to truncate the value to the corresponding position to the left of the decimal point.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
This property is read-only.
